name: Harry Connick Jr.
description:
Oh yeah, you know what time it is, peeps. Fill up your diaphragms, clear your vocal chords and lift your voices as one as we all... sing along with JONJ!

I had to be a Jew, I had to be a Jew 
I wandered around, and finally found 
The religion to
Which I could be true
Though I'm not through and through
It might make you glad
Or maybe just sad 
To know I'm a Jew 
Some albums I've made
'Bout Christmas, you say 
My Dad loved the cross
But he's not the boss 
And Mom was a Jew 
She gave me the blood that no album could kill 
With all of it's faults I am a Jew still 
I had to be a Jew 
I had to be a Jew 
I had to be a Jew
